name: Sword Truck
description:
Best experienced in full-screen mode.

You play as a lowly "dead-ex" truck driver delivering a sword through a seemingly endless graveyard full of angry ghosts looking to consume the swords energy. How far can you make it?..

Controls:

Up Arrow - Forward

Space - Swing sword

Left/Right Arrow - Lean truck.

Credits:

  • "Haunted Manor" by Elemental Woof
  • "Endless 2D Terrain Generator" by Neil Meredith (modified for 2D physics support).
